name: Espresso Brewing and Latte Art Workshop
description:
Ever wondered what it takes to make a perfect espresso or create beautiful latte art in your cup? Think surprising a coffee-loving loved one with a beautifully crafted latte art! 
Curated for both newbies and aficionados alike, with our ‘Espresso Brewing and Latte Art Workshop’ you will learn the basics of making an espresso, milk steaming, crema and recipes for different milk-based espresso drinks. Also, learn how to perfect your latte art skills in this session with our in-house trainers. 
We recommend this workshop to coffee enthusiasts and all budding baristas!  
Workshop Highlights 
Our brewing experts will take you through all the steps for making espresso and creating latte art, answer your questions and help you practice everything you’ve learnt!  
Date: 11th May 2024, SaturdayTime: 12 PM - 2 PMVenue: Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters | Koramangala 8th Block, Bengaluru  
Please note that the tickets for this event are non-refundable and you cannot transfer your ticket to a future event.
